scenes.title: The Fog-Shrouded Entrance
scenes.text: Alex stepped into the abandoned hospital. Thick fog clung to the cracked tiles like forgotten breath. Distant screaming echoed, faint as a dying pulse. They felt time bend, a subtle twist in the air. Shadows whispered secrets in the corners.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of fog-shrouded hospital entrance; cracked tiles on floor center; rusted metal door behind; flickering fluorescent light overhead; distant hallway shrouded in fog on right; old reception desk cluttered with yellowed papers on left.

scenes.title: Corridor of Echoes
scenes.text: Alex hurried down the corridor. The screaming grew louder, then looped back, repeating like a scratched record. Fog thickened, walls warping like melting wax. A whisper hissed: 'Again... always again.' They stumbled, heart racing.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of long hospital corridor; thick fog filling the space; warped walls bending inward; rusted gurney tipped over on right; flickering light bulb swinging from ceiling center; distant door at end shrouded in mist.

scenes.title: Reception's Secrets
scenes.text: Alex rifled through the desk. Papers scattered like dead leaves. A chart showed endless loops of patient names, repeating. Reality shifted; the room spun. Distant screams pierced the fog. A voice murmured: 'Cut deeper.' Blood dotted the page.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of cluttered reception desk; yellowed papers with blood stains scattered on top; old rotary phone on left edge; fog seeping under door behind; flickering screen on computer monitor center; warped clock on wall right showing repeated times.

scenes.title: Ascending Shadows
scenes.text: Alex climbed the stairs. Steps creaked, echoing into infinity. Fog rose like rising bile. Screams looped closer, distorting. Walls pulsed like veins. A whisper echoed: 'Up or down, it's the same cut.' Time folded in on itself.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of crumbling staircase; fog rising from below; pulsing vein-like patterns on walls; rusted railing on right; flickering light at top center; distorted shadows stretching upward.

scenes.title: Operating Theater Trap
scenes.text: Alex entered the theater. Instruments gleamed like hungry teeth. Fog swirled, screams deafening then resetting. Reality distorted; they saw themselves on the table, cut open. Blood sprayed in bursts. A voice whispered: 'Loop the incision.'
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of abandoned operating theater; surgical table center with blood stains; gleaming scalpels on tray left; thick fog swirling around; distorted mirror on back wall showing repeated self-images; flickering surgical lamp overhead.

scenes.title: Patient Room Nightmare
scenes.text: Alex pushed into the room. Beds lined like open graves. Fog choked the air. A figure twitched, body looping convulsions. Screams echoed from within. Reality bent; limbs elongated like pulled taffy. Blood seeped from cracks. Whisper: 'Join the cycle.'
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of dimly lit patient room; rusted beds lined against walls; twitching figure on central bed with elongated limbs; thick fog on floor; blood seeping from wall cracks right; flickering bulb in ceiling corner.

scenes.title: Blood Trail Descent
scenes.text: Alex followed the trail. It led to a basement door. Fog poured out like infected pus. Screams looped, growing frantic. Walls distorted into fleshy folds. A cut appeared on their arm, bleeding in rhythm. Voice hissed: 'Deeper, always deeper.'
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of basement doorway; blood trail on floor leading down; fog pouring from opening; fleshy distorted walls; rusted handle on door center; flickering light bulb above.

scenes.title: Rooftop Revelation
scenes.text: Alex reached the roof. Fog blanketed the world below. Screams looped from the abyss. Reality shattered; time rewound in fragments. They saw the hospital as a living organism, pulsing. Whisper: 'See the truth.' Clarity pierced the unease.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of hospital rooftop; thick fog over edge; pulsing organic shapes in structure; shattered glass fragments on ground center; flickering emergency light on left; distant city lights distorted below.

scenes.title: Shattered Loop
scenes.text: Alex smashed the mirror. Glass flew like arterial spray. The loop broke; screams faded. Fog lifted slightly. They ran, wounds healing in reverse. Reality stabilized. A final whisper: 'Free... for now.' They escaped into the night.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of shattered mirror in operating theater; glass shards on floor; fading fog; surgical table empty center; exit door open on right; flickering light reflecting off pieces.

scenes.title: Endless Hallway Madness
scenes.text: Alex fled, but the hallway stretched forever. Time looped endlessly. Screams became their own. Fog consumed vision. Mind fractured like brittle bone. Whispers merged into one: 'Stay in the cut.' Sanity dissolved into oblivion.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of infinite stretching hallway; thick fog filling space; distorted walls repeating; flickering lights in endless row; bloodied footprints on floor center; no visible end.

scenes.title: Possessed Fusion
scenes.text: Alex touched the figure. It merged with them, skin knitting like sutures. Time looped within. Screams internalized. Fog filled lungs. Reality distorted into one entity. Whisper: 'We are the procedure.' Identity absorbed.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of merging with twitching figure on bed; skin knitting together; fog swirling around; distorted limbs extending; blood pooling on sheets center; flickering light above.

scenes.title: Basement Oblivion
scenes.text: Alex descended. Darkness swallowed light. Fog turned to void. Screams looped into silence. Reality erased itself. They faded, body dissolving like mist. A last whisper: 'No more cycles.' Emptiness claimed all.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of dark basement; thick fog turning black; dissolving body parts in foreground; rusted pipes on walls; flickering faint light from stairs behind; void at center.

scenes.title: Corrupted Echo
scenes.text: Alex screamed back. The sound looped, amplifying. Fog congealed into forms. Reality twisted them inside out. Blood flowed upward. Whispers laughed: 'Become the horror.' They transformed, hospital's rot infusing every cell.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, harsh fluorescent lighting, clinical brightness, desaturated pastel colors, faded soft hues, subtle film grain. First-person view of self-transformation; blood flowing upward on arms; fog forming shapes around; distorted walls pulsing; rusted door center; flickering light casting shadows.
